headlines.description: Bournemouth's Callum Wilson and Ryan Fraser notched a goal and an assist in their team's 2-1 win against Huddersfield Town.
headlines.shortLinkText: Bournemouth snap four-game losing streak with Huddersfield win

video.headline: Bournemouth 2-1 Huddersfield: Wilson, Fraser power Cherries

tracking.trackingName: Bournemouth 2-1 Huddersfield: Wilson, Fraser power Cherries

events.name: Crystal Palace at Brighton & Hove Albion

headlines.description: Brighton & Hove Albion secured an emphatic 3-1 win over Crystal Palace in the Premier League on Tuesday despite having a man sent off early.
headlines.shortLinkText: Brighton's Hughton calls out Duffy after Palace win

video.headline: Brighton 3-1 Crystal Palace: 10-man Brighton get it done

tracking.trackingName: Brighton 3-1 Crystal Palace: 10-man Brighton get it done

events.name: Cardiff City at West Ham United

headlines.description: Substitute Lucas Perez scored his first two Premier League goals for West Ham United to help the east London side to a 3-1 home win over Cardiff.

video.headline: West Ham 3-1 Cardiff: Perez strikes for the Hammers

tracking.trackingName: West Ham 3-1 Cardiff: Perez strikes for the Hammers

headlines.shortLinkText: Perez brace sees West Ham past Cardiff

headlines.description: Manchester City held on for a 2-1 win against a resurgent Watford side at Vicarage Road on Tuesday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Mahrez magic as Man City hold off Watford

video.headline: Watford 1-2 Manchester City: Leaders hang on

tracking.trackingName: Watford 1-2 Manchester City: Leaders hang on
